original_title: Tom and Jerry: Spotlight Collection Vol. 1
overview: The following 112 shorts were directed by William Hanna and Joseph Barbera at the Metro-Goldwyn-Mayer cartoon studio in Hollywood, California. All shorts were released to theaters by Metro-Goldwyn-Mayer between 1940 â€“ 1958. The original MGM Hanna-Barbera classics are a total of 114 shorts.  Volume 1.
title: Tom and Jerry: Spotlight Collection Vol. 1
